website_summaries.verdict: The Nikon Coolpix S6200 is not exceptional in any way, but casual snapshooters in need of a pocket-friendly 10x zoom camera should check it out.
pros: The Nikon Coolpix S6200 packs an ultrawide-angle lens with a 10x zoom into a very small body, but still remains comfortable and easy to use
cons: The S6200's autofocus and overall shooting performance are mediocre

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, Horrible camcorder
customer_reviews.text: The video quality is really grainy in low light, which is to be expected with most cameras of this price range. The main reason for my return was the fact that it didn't even last 1 hour before running out of battery. It only records up to 30 minutes, and doesn't continue recording. (you have to start another recording after 30 minutes) I thought that I could keep a charging cord plugged into the camera so as not to run out of battery, but found that it would shut off completely, so it could charge. It's great for taking photos, but not an ideal video camera
customer_reviews.author: JaKobe

customer_reviews.title: Already not working
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Nikon cameras since my first camera as a kid. I loved this camera until it decided to just not turn on a few months after I got it. I've never dropped it or gotten it wet or any other ill treatment because I'm extremely careful when it comes to every one of my electronic devices. I don't know what happened.
customer_reviews.author: Satty Faulkie

customer_reviews.title: love this camera
customer_reviews.text: i love this camera. the only thing i have an issue with is at night when the flash goes off sometimes it ruins the image, but if you take the flash off it is kind of blurred i find. but then the video is great, pictures are awesome. i love the price for this camera, i have had it over a year and it is still holding up pretty well. one other issue i find is that i cant always get things in macro even when the setting is on but maybe i just need to explore that more, i dont spend much time taking macro photographs so its not much of an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Karly Fasth

customer_reviews.title: Problems Focusing
customer_reviews.text: Great overall easy to use camera, but it seems to have a focusing problem. When taking pictures in low light WITH THE FLASH ON half the pictures come out completely our of focus (not blurry from low light, but completely out of focus) and I have to take the picture again. Usually on the second try it comes out perfect, but its a pain. I returned the camera because of this and got another one, but it still happens with the replacement camera. In daylight, pictures come out beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymi McClusky

customer_reviews.title: Nikon coolpix S6200
customer_reviews.text: So far I have only taken a few pictures and i'm very impressed with the quality of them. Camera is extreamly easy to use. For being such a small camera the buttons are easy to access with big hands or small hands. Because it is so small you MUST use the wrist strap because it is very easy to drop. I would have purchased the memory card at the same time if the description would have stated there was not one included.
customer_reviews.author: 4funbgoofy

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix S6200 16MP
customer_reviews.text: The camera looks nice, it is compact and light. But the picture quality is not that good. I have compared the Nikon Coolpix S6200 16MP with the Panasonic Lumix 14MP. The Panasonic has a sharp and clear picture; in other word, the 14MP Panasonic produces better pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera wide angle lens collects a lot of light even in poor conditions great pics.
customer_reviews.author: W. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera...Pretty fast shutter
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good camera. So far I am extremely happy with my purchase. The shutter on the camera is pretty fast. The one downfall on the item is the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: dariey

customer_reviews.title: great camera, perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: Camera is easy to use, point and shoot. Takes great pictures with clarity and professional quality. Zoom is very powerful and doesn't cause picture to blur like other ca,meras
customer_reviews.author: David F. Butler

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Picture is kind of fuzzy and camera moves slow sending it back
customer_reviews.author: Monica B.

customer_reviews.title: Valuable for Price
customer_reviews.text: its good camera ....best for its price......if they provide accessories like memory card and camera pouch it should be better
customer_reviews.author: Indrasena reddy G

customer_reviews.title: Coolpix S6200
customer_reviews.text: Lov the pics & the video is amazing. Don't like the color i choice(black) and its a bit bulky. Over all I lov it.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Worst camera bought ever
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be the worst camera I ever bought. The camera shutter has some issue. When powered on it is blackish. nothing can be seen through the lens. Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pankaj Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Nice P&S Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the S6200 for three days. It has performed without any problems for me and has taken photos in varying light conditions. I am not a "photographer" and the P&S features work very well for me. The only thing I do not like is the absence of a REAL PRINTED manual. The only manual is in electronic format. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: modula2

customer_reviews.title: Beaware of this seller
customer_reviews.text: Feels cheated...was a open box item and used signed was there. Started battery was full charged and factory setting was modified.
customer_reviews.author: MD RAFIKUL ALAM

customer_reviews.title: Great for a compact point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: Got this camera a couple of weeks ago. It takes great pictures for a point and shoot. Zoom stability is good even at 10x. Menus are easy to understand and navigate, or you can just set it to automode, which also works well. Editing software that comes with it is very user friendly. Have not tried out recording videos yet, but then I didn't buy it for that anyway. This is an ideal camera for a novice who just wants something compact and easy to use out of the box that takes good photos. 16mp and 10x zoom for a Nikon this small and under $200 is a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Stable and sharp
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in time for my mom's visit....image stabilization feature was the main attraction for me, since I have Essential Tremor (google it; makes most cameras unusable for me). Well this little camera takes such quick shots that I rarely if ever take a blurry photo anymore! And the continuous shoot feature helps as well, since I can set it to take several pix at a time of the same shot and then choose between them later. Would definitely recommend this for someone with shaky hands who just wants a beginner's point & shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Pam C

customer_reviews.title: Hate everything about it but video, which eats batt.
customer_reviews.text: Fuzzy pictures, grainy, must edit to get any kind of quality shot. Have a few remarkable photos, but only with 200 ISO and outside in relatively clear weather. Worst camera for outdoor adventurers. The size is portable and it takes good video, except that kills the battery in nothing flat so you get few shots if you take any video. I have so many lost shots of wildflowers and summits in overcast weather. I have the few greats I mentioned because the weather was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Olytown

customer_reviews.title: WORTHLESS WARRANTY SEE Better Business Bureau
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera in may of 2012. I used this camera for 5 months and then lost image on one half of the LCD screen,so I sent it in to Nikon for repair under warranty.Nikon contacted me and told me I would have to pay over one hundred dollars to get it fixed even though it was under warranty.I checked with the BBB and found out Nikon has a F-Rating with the BBB at their repair center and that they had 199 complaints at that time.I wished I had have checked BBB before I bought the camera.I WILL NEVER BUY NIKON PRODUCTS AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel  Shelor

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera has stunning video and pictures. It is so easy to operate and is very small and compact. For the price this camera cannot be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Timm129

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the average Joe
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera for just about one year and have no complaints. It's great for when you need something a few steps up from your cell phone camera. It's perfect for traveling. I do not have a case for it. I just throw it in my purse and go, and there is no noticeable wear on it. I am not a photographer. I do not use this every day or even every week. It's very easy to use, great for the average person who just wants a camera.
customer_reviews.author: rwags

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little camera
customer_reviews.text: I put off getting a digital camera for some time but now am pleasantly surprised at how wonderful this Nikon s6200 is. I still have my N50, with 3 Nikkor lens but do not see 35mm film at Costco anymore. Progress ha!
customer_reviews.author: boccigallupo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am definitely pleased with this camera. It is easy to function and takes high quality photos. The buttons are a little stiff but I am sure this will correct itself overtime.
customer_reviews.author: Wearyj

customer_reviews.title: Yikes, disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Wanted the perfect compact camera to have when on the run with my children. The lightening on the pictures was not always the best and my flash stopped working for no reason. Be aware that once the flash goes, the camera is done.
customer_reviews.author: guhnd

customer_reviews.title: Oh well!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a great value for the price and good if looking for a point and shoot (I was.) My only qualm was the day after I ordered this, my local camera store ran a full-color ad from Nikon at a lower price than Amazon!! Unsually Amazon is always the cheapest source. Also Amazon had only the black model in stock at the price but the camera store with the lower price had the camera in all colors. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: raptor

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Glorified Tin
customer_reviews.text: What happened to Nikon! I got this for Christmas, broke right away. Slow slow, long pause between taking pic, and flash. Subject is long gone!
customer_reviews.author: Ann E. Picard

product_meta.title: Nikon COOLPIX S6200 16 MP Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom NIKKOR ED Glass Lens and HD 720p Video (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackEnjoy the high-performance S6200, a 10x optical zoom COOLPIX S-series model incorporating advanced functions in a refined design. The S6200 is a stylish model that, despite being equipped with a 10x optical zoom NIKKOR lens, has a slim, compact and elegant body. In addition to offering excellent basic performance with superior image quality and high-speed response, the S6200 is equipped with four features less noise at high sensitivities, Motion detection function, lens-shift vibration reduction (VR) function, flash control system that enable capture of beautiful nighttime shots. The S6200 is also equipped with a hand-held/tripod night landscape detection function that enables it to automatically distinguish between hand-held shooting and shooting with the camera mounted on a tripod to provide the optimum response to shooting conditions regardless of lighting levels, making successful capture of blur-free night landscapes even easier. What's more, Special effects mode for shooting and Filter effects for editing photos already taken allow you to create artistic photos and movies never before possible.

Storage media Internal memory (approx. 74 MB), SD/SDHC/SDXC memory card ISO sensitivity ISO 80, 100, 200, 400, 800, 1600, 3200 Auto (auto gain from ISO 80 to 1600) Fixed range auto (ISO 80 to 400, 80 to 800) Interface Hi-Speed USB HDMI output Can be selected from Auto, 480p, 720p, and 1080i Power sources One Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL12 (supplied) AC Adapter EH-62F (available separately) Dimensions(WxHxD) Approx. 93.0 x 56.7 x 25.4 mm Dimensions(WxHxD) Approx. 93.0 x 56.7 x 25.4 mm / Weight Approx. 160 g (including battery and SD memory card) Supplied accessories Camera Strap, Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL12, Charging AC Adapter EH-69P, USB Cable UC-E6, A/V Cable EG-CP16, ViewNX 2 CD-ROM

FROM THE MANUFACTURER



Among the slimmest 10x zoom compact cameras available today, the Nikon COOLPIX S6200 will amaze you with versatility, image quality and style. Your on-the-go moments with family and friends will be saved in an instant as high-resolution, 16.0-MP photos and HD (720p) movies with stereo sound. Touch a button and shoot frame after frame—whether near or far—with a powerful10x optical Zoom-NIKKOR ED glass lens. Then add creative special effects using in-camera features and watch your viewers marvel at your photos on the S6200's large 2.7-inch display or when connected to an HDTV.


BIG REACH IN A SMALL PACKAGE
10X ZOOM IN AN ULTRA COMPACT DESIGN
The S6200 goes everywhere to capture the moments of your life—a child's first smile or a beautiful sunset over the mountains. Despite its slim profile (approximately 1-inch thin), the S6200 boasts a powerful 10x optical Zoom-NIKKOR ED glass lens with a highly versatile zoom range. Capture stunning close-up portraits one moment, then zoom in even further to make an HD (720p) movie of your kids passing by in the Main Street parade. Carry the S6200 wherever you go and bring the smiles closer.

BRILLIANTLY RECORD EVERY MOMENT
STUNNING DETAIL AND SHARPNESS
See life differently with the S6200's advanced EXPEED C2 image processing capability. Zoom in and rest assured that its 16.0-megapixel CCD image sensor has clearly captured every freckle on your child's face. And with precision NIKKOR optics and VR image stabilization, even shots you take while chasing after your toddler will be priceless. You're on the run grabbing all those special moments, and the S6200 will keep up. Family memories last a lifetime if you trust them to Nikon.

PUT MEMORIES IN MOTION
HD (720P) MOVIES WITH STEREO SOUND
If you haven't been saving memories with movies, get started now with the S6200. With a single touch of a button, you'll capture every sight and sound of a baby's first steps, a bride's first kiss or the laughter over a friend's most embarrassing moment in HD (720p) with stereo sound. The S6200's powerful 10x zoom lets you bring the action closer for dramatic close-ups. Then plug the mini HDMI connector into an HDTV and easily share those moments. It's your life—start putting memories in motion.



ADD YOUR CREATIVE TOUCH
ONE-TOUCH SELECTABLE SHOOTING EFFECTS
It's easy to add pizzazz to your photos and movies. Touch a button and get creative by shooting in black and white, a soft sepia for a nostalgic mood, high key or even low key. The S6200 does all the work, so you don't have to spend any time using special processing software later on. And you'll love incorporating filter effects such as fisheye, soft focus or even miniaturization. Unleash your creative side and experiment with all the creative tools the S6200 offers. Start spicing up your world.

UN-COMPLICATE YOUR LIFE
CONVENIENT FEATURES FOR OPTIMAL SHOOTING
Your life is complicated; your camera shouldn't be. With the S6200, just point and shoot to capture the smiles—near and far. With the help of 18 scene modes, including Auto Scene Selector and Nikon's amazing Smart Portrait System, you'll never have to guess how to configure the camera to an environment. Just aim on a grin and the S6200 does all the work for you. It automatically sets the optimum Scene Mode, finds and focuses on the face, fixes red eye and even warns you if your subject blinks! The S6200 keeps photography fun, easy and enjoyable.



STEADY EVEN WHEN YOU’RE NOT
The S6200's Vibration Reduction (VR) Image Stabilization features automatically reduce the streaky images associated with shaky cameras.





STRENGTH IN NUMBERS
You'll always get a great shot with Nikon's Best Shot Selector. Press the shutter once, and the S6200 takes up to ten shots and then selects and saves only the sharpest image.
feature_bullets: 10x optical Zoom-NIKKOR ED glass lens in a compact body design
16 effective megapixel CCD sensor and VR image stabilization for sharp, clear stills and movies
One-touch HD (720p) movie recording with optical zoom and stereo sound (HDMI mini connector equipped)
Add creative touches to your photos and movies
20 Scene modes make picture taking point and shoot easy

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars48 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
